name: Vanguard of Demise: FFA
description:
Welcome to multiplayer alpha testing of Vanguard of Demise!

The game is in early state and sadly it is currently not being actively developed at this stage. Right now game only offers basic gunplay - Free For All gamemode with weapons dropped on ground.

Check out controls guide below, pick a name to differentiate from other people (nametag will appear to other players screens) if you actually want to somewhat enjoy the game bring 1-2 of your friends to shoot around, we had bots implemented but I had to remove it because it wasn't fully polished and ready. So at the moment game is completely dependent on multiplayer.

Basic controls and tips:

  • WASD to walk, full screen recommended to avoid bugging out on some devices.
  • Hover over a weapon with mouse cursor (and crosshair) and press E to pick up a weapon when you stand near it.
  • Move mouse to aim your weapon, LMB to fire, RMB to zoom, R to reload.
  • X to drop weapon in hand, 1 and 2 to switch between primary and secondary weapon.

    Pick the name when you join a game, or press Play to go with a randomly picked one.
